item.description:
Okay, so let's try this again. We'll be meeting for Dimsum on Saturday Jan. 7, at 10:45 in South Station near the Au Bon Pain. We'll walk from there over to Hei La Moon, a local place that's pretty popular. (If you know where it is, just meet us there.)

Maybe afterward we can go see a movie, or hit a bookstore. =)

Hei la Moon
88 Beach Street, Boston, MA 02111
(617) 338-8813
Since it has no prominent sign in English, Hei La Moon is easy to miss.
Coming from Chinatown, go through the Gate and cross the street. Hei La Moon is on your left.


For more information, see http://www.hiddenbost...

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: Dimsum Saturday Redux
